name: Blanton's Bourbon
description: Cool stubby bottle with horse on top. Better bourbon.

reviews.quote: This is one of my favorite bourbons ever. And that decagonal bottle is pretty cool. Collect them all!
reviews.author: Mark Palfreeman

name: Angel's Envy
description: Cooler bottle with wings. 80-proof bourbon finished in sherry casks. Smooth like butter.

reviews.quote: Awesome whiskey! Like, those angels must be envious.
reviews.author: Mark Palfreeman
